017package org.spongepowered.configurate.reactive;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
020
021import java.util.function.Function;
022
023/**
024 * A combination of an {@link Publisher} and {@link Subscriber}.
025 * <p>
026 * Processors are expected to broadcast their submitted values to any registered observers, though
027 * filtering or other transformations may be applied.
028 * <p>
029 * Submitting a completion event to the processor will result in a completion event being passed to
030 * every subscriber, and the rejection of further events being submitted.
031 *
032 * @param <I> The type observed
033 * @param <O> The type produced
034 */
035public interface Processor<I, O> extends Publisher<O>, Subscriber<I> {
036    /**
037     * Create a {@link Processor} instance that simply broadcasts submitted values to its
038     * subscribers
039     *
040     * @param <V> The type
041     * @return A new processor instance
042     */
043    static <V> Processor.Iso<V> create() {
044        return new ProcessorBase<>();
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * {@inheritDoc}
049     */
050    @Override
051    default <R> Processor<O, R> map(Function<? super O, ? extends R> mapper) {
052        return new ProcessorBase.Mapped<>(mapper, this);
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * Submit an element of the observed type, bypassing any mapping this Processor may do. If the
057     * input type of this processor equals the output type, this is equivalent to {@link
058     * #submit(Object)}
059     *
060     * @param element The element to submit
061     */
062    void inject(O element);
063
064    /**
065     * Provide a {@link Subscriber} that will handle events submitted to this processor, but only if
066     * no other subscription is active.
067     *
068     * @param subscriber The fallback subscriber to add. Provide {@code null} to remove the handler
069     */
070    void setFallbackHandler(@Nullable Subscriber<O> subscriber);
071
072    /**
073     * Close this processor if there are no remaining subscriptions. Any signals that have already
074     * been submitted will be processed.
075     * <p>
076     * Any call to this method after the {@link Processor} has been closed will simply return true.
077     *
078     * @return true if there are no subscribers and this processor is closed
079     */
080    boolean closeIfUnsubscribed();
081
082    /**
083     * A Processor that has the same type for inputs and outputs
084     *
085     * @param <V> The input and output type
086     */
087    interface Iso<V> extends Processor<V, V> {
088        @Override
089        default void inject(V element) {
090            submit(element);
091        }
092    }
093}
